title: How to Make Paneer Jalfrezi

steps.headline: Heat oil in a pan and add jeera to sparkle.
When the onion edges begin to turn golden brown, add capsicum & salt.
Cook for sometime & then add red chilli powder, turmeric & dhania powder.
Add tomato pieces after 5 minutes.
steps.description: Tomato puree can also be added.

steps.headline: When the gravy thickens a little, add the paneer pieces.
Cook till the masala binds with the paneer.
Add 1 tsp lime juice before removing from flame.
Garnish with fried almonds or kasoori methi or coriander leaves.

text: Heat oil in a pan and add jeera to sparkle. Add ginger-garlic paste & onion. When the onion edges begin to turn golden brown, add capsicum & salt.  Cook for sometime & then add red chilli powder, turmeric & dhania powder.  Add tomato pieces after 5 minutes. Tomato puree can also be added. When the gravy thickens a little, add the paneer pieces.  Cook till the masala binds with the paneer.  Add 1 tsp lime juice before removing from flame.  Garnish with fried almonds or kasoori methi or coriander leaves.
